ca.concordia.lanternsentities.helper

Class MatrixOrganizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.lanternsentities.helper.MatrixOrganizer

  • public class MatrixOrganizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that helps to manage a bi-dimensional matrix of LakeTile.

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(LakeTile[][] matrix)

      • getLineColumn

        public static int[] getLineColumn(LakeTile[][] matrix,
                                  java.lang.String id)
        Get the line and column of a tile inside a matrix give its id.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix to search.
        id - The id of the tile.
        Returns:
        An array with {line,column} values, or null, if id is not found in the matrix.

      • findTile

        public static LakeTile findTile(LakeTile[][] matrix,
                                java.lang.String id)
        Find a tile in a matrix by its id.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix to search.
        id - The id of the tile.
        Returns:
        The LakeTile in the matrix that has the same id as the parameter, or null if not found.

      • count

        public static int count(LakeTile[][] matrix)
        Count the number of valid elements in the matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Lake tile matrix.
        Returns:
        The number of lake tiles currently in the lake.

      • addElement

        public static LakeTile[][] addElement(LakeTile[][] matrix,
                                      LakeTile value,
                                      MatrixOrganizer.Direction direction,
                                      int line,
                                      int column)
        Add element to matrix in one specific direction of an existing element, expanding the matrix if necessary.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The original matrix
        value - The LakeTile to be added
        direction - The direction, regarding the existing element, where the new value should be placed
        line - the line of the existing element
        column - the column of the existing element
        Returns:
        The matrix with the value placed, or, if the matrix has been expanded, a new matrix with a copy of the values of the original one on it, plus the new value in place.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the matrix was not initialized; if the position [line,column] is invalid; or if the position the new element is being placed is already filled.

      • getOppositeTileSideIndex

        public static MatrixOrganizer.Direction getOppositeTileSideIndex(MatrixOrganizer.Direction direction)
        Can be used to obtain the index of an opposite side of a lake tile. Useful when checking for adjacent tiles.
        Parameters:
        direction - A specific tile side direction index.
        Returns:
        The index of the opposing side of a lake tile index.
